Parameter.Description: Name of te cap point being evaluated.

Parameter.Name: DebugCircleID
Parameter.Description: ID of the debug circle used for displaying the prototype radius.

Parameter.Name: CapturePointID
Parameter.Description: The Index of the Capture point, starts with 1.

Parameter.Name: TurretGuardId
Parameter.Description: The SquadId of the turretguard for this point

Parameter.Name: SpawnLoc
Parameter.Description: What Position should the wave spawn at?

Parameter.Description: Wich Lane should they push?

Parameter.Name: ReverseLane
Parameter.Description: Should they go backwards down the lane?

Parameter.Description: Position to start the minion wave spawn

Parameter.Name: ControllingTeam
Parameter.Description: TeamEnum representing the controlling team.

Parameter.Name: OpposingPointOwner
Parameter.Description: Who controls the point at the opposite end of the lane?

Parameter.Name: ReverseMinionPath
Parameter.Description: Should the minion wave be reversed?

Parameter.Description: Name of the squad we're spawning. Useful for identifying units later.
